Posts.EditableText:
Hey, I'm trying to export a newer version of my game.
In the game setup tab I can change the release version and game name, but when I export the finished 
product it retains the original name.

Where do I edit the name to change the exported file name?

Thanks in advance.

Posts.EditableText: Ifyou want to rename your game, you must rename the gamefile (*.aslx) and perhaps the game directory. But why do you want th change the name of your game?
Posts.HTML: Ifyou want to rename your game, you must rename the gamefile (*.aslx) and perhaps the game directory. But why do you want th change the name of your game?

Posts.EditableText: You can just rename the .quest file in the Explorer window that pops up. You can change the game name in the "game" section of the editor. And on the Publish screen you can manually update all the game details after uploading the file anyway.
